perceptor:

Perceptor smiled devilish and said "Then you will love this 
information... altought Rodimus is safe inside Maximal base, he's 
suffering a painful torture: we captured at his wife and now she 
serves to Hydras's cause under the name of Blackstorm with a 
ingenius reprogramation...."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/21/03 12:44:37 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Blackstorm!"said cooly perceptor "Prepare all instruments... We 
> > will do a massive reconstruction, I see you in area 6 in Cr's"
> > 
> > "Yes, Perceptor"said the femme and she moved acros the Cr's 
chamber 
> > and picked up diferents tools.
> > 
> > Perceptor took in arms at Maxima and lef her on a table in Area 
6. 
> > he typed some buttoms of a console that was near him and a 
powerful 
> > scanner started to check Maxima's condition and main problems.
> > 
> > "Whoever did this, Maxima"said Perceptor "really liked to kill 
you"
> > 
> 
> She never smirked. "2 names. 1 of them an old rival: Windlord... & 
Rodimus!" 
> she growled when she spoke the name of Rodimus Prime. How she 
hated him. 
> Stemming back all the way from not just tossing Galvatron from 
Unicron, but 
> from his struggle with Megatron, which led to the final struggle 
between 
> Megatron & Optimus Prime. If Rodimus had not of meddled with 
Megatron 
> reaching for the blaster, Megatron may have shot Prime down or 
something 
> else. 
> 
> Ooooh, how she hated Rodimus. She dreamed of the day she would see 
him cease 
> to exist.. slow & in terrible pain.
